## Remarks An <xref:System.Exception> that is thrown as a direct result of a previous <xref:System.Exception> should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing`) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner <xref:System.Exception> value to the constructor.
